name: NCWidgetSearchViewController
desc: An object that provides a default search view within a macOS Today widget.DeprecatedUse WidgetKit instead.

items.name: var delegate: NCWidgetSearchViewDelegate?
items.desc: The search view controller’s delegate or nil if the receiver doesn’t have a delegate.

items.name: protocol NCWidgetSearchViewDelegate
items.desc: The interface for enabling user searches in the search view controller of a macOS Today widget.

items.name: var searchDescription: String?
items.desc: A localized description of the nature of the search.

items.name: var searchResultsPlaceholderString: String?
items.desc: A localized phrase displayed in the results list when no search results are available.

items.name: var searchResultKeyPath: String?
items.desc: A key path for the string property to display for each object in the search results array.
